Skill.Name: Dodge
Skill.SpeciesCanUseSkill: Human Mutant Genics_A Genics_B Aquatic Angelic Demonic Fun
Skill.Description: Roll a d12 if its equal to or under the models Ag the model may dive out of the way of a trap in a random direction.

RequiresPermission.Name: Trap Setter
RequiresPermission.SpeciesCanEquip: Human Mutant Genics_A Genics_B Aquatic Angelic Demonic Fun
